megfractal.subject.Study¶

class megfractal.subject.Study(conditions)¶

This class gathers all recordings from a given study. It is used to perform analysis across sensors or subjects.

Attributes
runs

Text

Methods

fix_freq_band(self, n_moments, freq_band, conditions)¶

Adjusts the given frequency band to match the maximal scale computable for each recording

Parameters
n_momentsint

Number of moments to use in the wavelet decomposition

freq_band(int, int)

Base frequency band to adjust

conditionslist[str]

names of the conditions to adjust the frequency band for

static from_fif_files(study_name, subjects, run_extension, fname_template, epoching=None, mode='oom')¶

Load a study, which is composed of the specified (n_subjects x n_runs) recordings.

gen_fractal(self, n_moments=2, freq_band=(0.01, 2), conditions=None)¶

Compute fractal values for all the signals in the study

Parameters
n_momentsint

Number of moments of the Daubechies wavelet used in the transform

freq_band(int, int)

Frequency band over which to fit the linear regression

runslist[str] | None

Names of the runs for which to compute the fractal values. None defaults to all runs

gen_multifractal(self, j1=1, j2=10, normalization=1, gamint=0.0, weighted=True, wt_name='db3', p_exp=None, q=None, n_cumul=3, conditions=None, correct_gamint=True)¶
